public class EventsActivity extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
EventsActivity Main entrant home screen. Shows events, supports category filters, availability filters, searching, QR scanning, and listens for real-time notifications.

    • resetHighlight

      private void resetHighlight(android.widget.LinearLayout layout, android.widget.ImageView icon, android.widget.TextView text)
      Resets a category button that includes an icon. Applies the unselected background, orange icon tint, and orange text color.
      Parameters:
      layout - The category layout container.
      icon - The ImageView icon inside the category button.
      text - The TextView label of the category button.

    • highlightSelectedNoIcon

      private void highlightSelectedNoIcon(android.widget.LinearLayout layout, android.widget.TextView text)
      Highlights the selected category button that does NOT have an icon. Clears all other highlights first, then applies the selected background and dark text color for readability.
      Parameters:
      layout - The category layout container.
      text - The TextView label of the selected category.

    • resetHighlightNoIcon

      private void resetHighlightNoIcon(android.widget.LinearLayout layout, android.widget.TextView text)
      Resets a category button that does NOT have an icon. Applies the unselected background and orange text color.
      Parameters:
      layout - The category layout container.
      text - The TextView label of the category button.

    • resetAllCategoryHighlights

      private void resetAllCategoryHighlights()
      Resets the highlight state of ALL category buttons. Ensures only one category can appear selected at a time. Applies the proper reset method depending on whether the category button contains an icon or not.
